result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Travis Lamar Birkley

records.addlTxt: Status conference scheduled for December 2, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Travis Lamar Birkley in court, in custody.  Attorney Allison Marie Ritter and Attorney Jaymes Fenton in court for Travis Lamar Birkley.  Attorney Grant Ian Huebner in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Arraignment held.
Original Information previously filed.  Defendant was arraigned in open court and pled not guilty. 
Defense counsel is requesting additional time to complete review of the discovery.  
Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 28. 

Clerk:  jms

Defendant Travis Lamar Birkley appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Allison Marie Ritter appeared by video for Travis Lamar Birkley.  Attorney Grant Ian Huebner in court in person for State of Wisconsin. 
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  States offers stipulation of case #02JV251A for this hearing only. Sworn for the State: MPD Homicide Detective T. Keller. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed. Defense Counsel requests an Arraignment. Case is adjourned to Branch 28.
Arraignment scheduled for October 4, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Travis Lamar Birkley not in court.  Attorney Allison Marie Ritter in court for Travis Lamar Birkley.  Attorney Grant Ian Huebner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. Due to COVID restrictions Mr. Birkley is unable to appear for todays proceedings. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 16, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Allison Marie Ritter in court, appear by video. Defendant Travis Lamar Birkley not in court, in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. Defendant currently hospitalized. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 31, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 29, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Travis Lamar Birkley in court with Attorney Allison Marie Ritter.  Defendant Travis Lamar Birkley in custody.  Grant Ian Huebner appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  All parties appear in person.
Attorney Ritter advises Court she has been appointed by the Public Defender's office.
Court orders case adjourned for preliminary hearing in Branch PE.

Clerk:  jms

Case is rescheduled to July 22 at 9:00 a.m. due to availability of counsel.

Clerk:  jms
Order to show cause hearing scheduled for July 21, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Travis Lamar Birkley in court with Attorney Thomas Holland Reed.  Defendant Travis Lamar Birkley in custody.  Grant Ian Huebner appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  All parties appear in person.
Statements to the Court by defense counsel as to attempts to appoint counsel.  Their office has a conflict therefore it must be an outside appointment.

For reasons stated on the record, Court orders case adjourned for CAUSE and adjourned for further status of counsel hearing in Branch 28.

Clerk:  jms
Memorandum from State Public Defender's office as to effort to appoint counsel - received

Defendant Travis Lamar Birkley not in court, defendant in custody.  Grant Huebner appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is on standby. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for cause to the trial court for a State V. Lee Hearing.  Hearing scheduled for July 14, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Travis Lamar Birkley not in court, defendant in custody.  Grant Ian Huebner appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. State witness present. SPD has not appointed counsel. State requests the matter be sent to the trial court for a State V. Lee hearing. Request is denied. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 7, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered no contact with Tiffany O., Syris B., Denis B., Kamrain B., and any member of the victim's family.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Court ordered one million dollars cash bail.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.
  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Travis Lamar Birkley in court with attorney Mary Garvin Guimont.  Defendant Travis Lamar Birkley in custody.  Anthony J Moore appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Rothstein, Branch 25.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.

  All parties are notified that effective June 13, 2022 this case will be assigned to Judge Mark Sanders, Branch 28, in Room 620 of the Safety Building.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 15, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
